validationErrors.message: Field "testCases": Test case 1: Expected output should be in stdout format, not data structure format
Field "testCases": Test case 2: Expected output should be in stdout format, not data structure format

originalDocument.title: Word Break II
originalDocument.content:
You are given a string s and a list of words wordDict. Your task is to insert spaces in s to form all possible sentences such that each word is present in wordDict.

Return all valid sentences that can be formed. Words in the dictionary can be reused multiple times if needed.
constraints: s and wordDict[i] consist only of lowercase English letters.
All words in wordDict are unique.
Input is guaranteed such that the total output length does not exceed 10âµ.

testCases.input:
catsanddog
cat cats and sand dog
testCases.description: Two valid sentences can be formed: "cats and dog" and "cat sand dog".
testCases.original_input:
catsanddog
cat cats and sand dog

testCases.input:
pineapplepenapple
apple pen applepen pine pineapple
testCases.expectedOutput: ["pine apple pen apple","pineapple pen apple","pine applepen apple"]
testCases.description: There are three possible segmentations of the string using words from the dictionary.
testCases.original_input:
pineapplepenapple
apple pen applepen pine pineapple
testCases.original_output: ["pine apple pen apple","pineapple pen apple","pine applepen apple"]

testCases.input:
catsandog
cats dog sand and cat
testCases.description: No valid sentence can be formed using the given dictionary.
testCases.original_input:
catsandog
cats dog sand and cat
